entry.title: Current Conditions: -8.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: North East Margaree 06:00 AM ADT Tuesday 14 March 2023
Temperature: -8.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.9 kPa falling
Humidity: 93 %
Wind Chill: -11
Dewpoint: -9.6°C
Wind: N 4 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly cloudy. High plus 3.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy this afternoon. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 this afternoon. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 9 this morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM ADT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow. Low zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning near midnight. Amount 5 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 increasing to 50 gusting to 70 except gusting to 140 from Margaree Harbour to Bay St. Lawrence overnight. Low zero. Forecast issued 05:00 AM ADT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High plus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Snow ending in the morning then cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain showers. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind east 50 km/h gusting to 70 except gusting to 140 from Margaree Harbour to Bay St. Lawrence in the morning and early in the afternoon. High plus 2. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM ADT Tuesday 14 March 2023
